title: Twisted Treeline (3v3) Ranked Please
body:
Can you please look at making ranked 3s on every week for a day or two. Its annoying that you guys decide that because 3s isnt getting the popularity as you would like that you decide to disable it... How about you enable it for a day or two each week and see how many people play. I dont like playing it on normals but like ranked and I am sure there are others out there that are the same. Its been over 2 years now that we havent had ranked 3s up now. Just give us the option PLEASE! {{item:3070}}
We will let the community vote aswell
